abstract: A value that indicates whether the coordinator’s photo output is ready to respond to new capture requests in a timely manner.
overview:
## Discussion

The value incorporates the photo output’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/captureReadiness-swift.property] property value and any requests registered by calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinator/startTrackingCaptureRequest(using:)] method. The system updates this value before calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinatorDelegate/readinessCoordinator(_:captureReadinessDidChange:)] method.

This property is key-value observable.

# captureReadiness

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates whether the coordinator’s photo output is ready to respond to new capture requests in a timely manner.

## Declaration

```swift
var captureReadiness: AVCapturePhotoOutput.CaptureReadiness { get }
```

## Discussion

The value incorporates the photo output’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutput/captureReadiness-swift.property] property value and any requests registered by calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinator/startTrackingCaptureRequest(using:)] method. The system updates this value before calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinatorDelegate/readinessCoordinator(_:captureReadinessDidChange:)] method.

This property is key-value observable.
title: captureReadiness
